name: Dicing Blades
description:
Action game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 solo developed by Cronecs.

Dicing Blades. A game that has nothing to do with blades or any kind of sharp edges. Fight for your life with your mouse and MOVEMENT keys. ROLL OVER your enemies! GET SCORE BY ROLLING OVER YOUR ENEMIES! Enemies GET ROLLED lol.

also dice... nice

Tutorial

--------------

WASD movement

ability! -- ROLL - insta kills your enemies - roll over your enemies by pressing SPACE and aim with MOUSE.

This game was created for the GMTK game jam 2022. However sadly as the deadline drew near thousands of people started to upload their games and the server/s started became unusable, so i could not submit it.
